SEARCH
Package cycling

Class Rider

java.lang.Object
cycling.Rider
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Rider extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a rider in a cycling team, including their identification, name, year of birth, and the team they belong to.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Olly Johnson and Laith Al Qudah
See Also:
